info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, Polk and north central Spartanburg Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Columbus, Rutherfordton, Tryon, Landrum, Mill Spring, Green Creek, Harris, Lake Adger and Fingerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
